text: Albert Lerat was a Belgian bobsledder who competed in the late 1940s. He won the silver medal in the four-man event at the 1947 FIBT World Championships in St. Moritz. ==References== *Bobsleigh four-man world championship medalists since 1930 Category:Belgian male bobsledders Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing
title: Albert Lerat
